• Back to overview
mcode Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.core

Element Dosage

Documentation:

The dosage of the medication. The data structure is flexible and can describe a dosage prescribed, administered, or reported.

Ancestors:
  • Dosage
Used By:
  • MedicationExposure, 
  • MedicationRequest, 
  • MedicationStatement

    • Field Summary

      Properties Defined Constraints Value
      DoseAmount

      The amount of medication taken per dose, as a quantity or range. Relative dose (e.g., per kg body weight or surface area) are indicated by specifying appropriate units (e.g., mg/kg or mg/m2 etc).
      DataType
      Cardinality
      DoseAmount
      0..1
      TimingOfDoses

      When doses of medication should be administered.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      TimingOfDoses
      0..1
      AsNeededIndicator

      Indicates the pre-condition under which the drug or intervention should be used.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      AsNeededIndicator
      0..1
      DosageInstructionsText

      The directions (signetur) on the drug prescription or dispensing record.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      DosageInstructionsText
      0..1
      AdditionalDosageInstruction

      Supplemental instructions - e.g. 'with meals'.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Value Set
      AdditionalDosageInstruction
      0..*
      http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/additional-instruction-codes (REQUIRED)
      RouteIntoBody

      The way a substance enters an organism after contact, particularly, the route of drug administration.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Value Set
      RouteIntoBody
      0..1
      http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/route-codes (REQUIRED)
      DosageMethod

      Technique for administering medication.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Value Set
      DosageMethod
      0..1
      http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administration-method-codes (REQUIRED)
      DosageBodyLocation

      The anatomic site at which medical intervention is applied.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      DosageBodyLocation
      0..1
      MaximumDosePerTimePeriod

      The maximum amount of a medication to be taken in a given period of time (e.g., no more than x in any 24-hour period)
      DataType
      Cardinality
      MaximumDosePerTimePeriod
      0..1
